mapper.select: SELECT HOTELCODE, HOTELNAME, ID, NVL( ( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ROOMBOOKING r WHERE r.ROOMCODE = ( SELECT ROOMCODE FROM ROOM ro WHERE ro.HOTELCODE = ( SELECT HOTELCODE FROM HOTEL ho WHERE ho.ID = ht.id AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ) AND CHECKIN > SYSDATE - 7 AND CHECKIN < SYSDATE AND STATUS = 'Y' ) / NULLIF( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ROOMBOOKING r WHERE r.ROOMCODE = ( SELECT ROOMCODE FROM ROOM ro WHERE ro.HOTELCODE = ( SELECT HOTELCODE FROM HOTEL ho WHERE ho.ID = ht.id AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ) AND CHECKIN > SYSDATE - 15 AND CHECKIN < SYSDATE - 8 AND STATUS = 'Y' ) , 0) - 100 ), 0 ) AS useratio , ( select count(*) from ROOMREVIEW where BOOKINGCODE = (SELECT BOOKINGCODE FROM ROOMBOOKING r WHERE r.ROOMCODE = ( SELECT ROOMCODE FROM ROOM ro WHERE ro.HOTELCODE = ( SELECT HOTELCODE FROM HOTEL ho WHERE ho.ID = ht.id AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ) AND CHECKIN > SYSDATE - 7 AND CHECKIN < SYSDATE AND STATUS = 'Y' )) revieCnt FROM HOTEL ht

SELECT rb.ID , rv.CONTENT, rv.RATING, rv.INPUTDATE FROM ROOMREVIEW rv, ROOM r, ROOMBOOKING rb where rv.BOOKINGCODE = rb.BOOKINGCODE(+) and rb.ROOMCODE = r.ROOMCODE(+) and r.HOTELCODE = #{hotelCode} and rv.INPUTDATE > sysdate-7
